name: Axiom Seymour Oceanweave P35+ Panniers
description:
Carry all your day's needs on daily commutes or weekend tours, and help reduce waste in our waterways. The Seymour Oceanweave panniers' spacious compartments have plenty of room for your groceries, light touring gear, or work and school needs, and the waterproof fabric is dependable when the rain starts falling. Easy on-off hardware are a breeze when coming and going.Oceanweave® fabric is made with reclaimed fishnets.Water-resistant stiching and a polyurethane coating keep contents dry.Internal backboard keeps the pannier's shape.Rixen & Kaul® attachment system fits rails 6 to 16mm.Daisy-chain loops provide options for additional tie-downs.Reflective accents and light loops on both sides enhance visibility.

        Sustainability
